item.title: Nvidia posted another monster quarter. Here is the number that impressed analysts the most
item.description: Nvidia was able to clear another sky high earnings bar, with analysts left most impressed by one number: its Blackwell and Rubin chips sales guidance.

item.title: Saba Capital activist investor Boaz Weinstein sees 'storm brewing' in UK investment trusts — and has pounced on these two names
item.description: Activist hedge fund manager Boaz Weinstein unveiled two bets in the U.K. investment trust space at this year's Sohn London event.

item.title: Nvidia delivers big once again, and investors brush aside the bigger picture about AI spending
item.description: The real debate — whether all this AI capacity being built today will be profitable tomorrow — remains unresolved.

item.title: TJX results show it's eating Target's lunch. Why that will continue
item.description: TJX is showing consistency with its earnings reports, analysts say.

item.title: Private assets in 401(k)s could boost long-term performance. Here's how some are already making it work
item.description: Private equity and private credit may improve returns of 401(k) plans in the long term, if done right, recent studies have shown.
